resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104501</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104501</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207139</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Arts and Literature: Peace Corps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste und Literatur: Friedenskorps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts et littérature : Corps de Paix</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes e literatura: Corpo De Paz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti e letteratura: Corpo di pace</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες και λογοτεχνία: Ειρήνη Σώμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes y literatura: Cuerpo De Paz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">features lessons about stories, folk tales, poems, and letters from the experiences of Peace Corps volunteers. Examine writing style and techniques: vivid images, powerful descriptions, balanced sentences, parallelism, and more. Read folk tales from Togo, Macedonian, Romania, and Russia; learn about structure and patterns in the tales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kennzeichnet Lektionen über Geschichten, 
Volksgeschichten, Gedichte und Zeichen von den Erfahrungen der 
Friedenskorpsfreiwilliger. Überprüfen Sie Schreibweise und 
Techniken: klare Bilder, leistungsfähige Beschreibungen, 
ausgeglichene Programmsätze, Parallelität und mehr. Lesen Sie 
Volksgeschichten von Togo, Macedonian, von Rumänien und von Rußland;
erlernen Sie über Struktur und Muster in den Geschichten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">comporte des leçons au sujet des histoires, des 
contes folkloriques, des poésies, et des lettres des expériences des
volontaires de corps de paix. Examinez le modèle et les 
techniques d'écriture : images vives, descriptions puissantes, 
phrases équilibrées, parallélisme, et plus. Lisez les contes 
folkloriques du Togo, Macédonien, de Roumanie, et de Russie ; 
renseignez-vous sur la structure et les configurations dans les 
contes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">caracteriza lições sobre histórias, tales 
populares, poemas, e letras das experiências de voluntários do corpo
de paz. Examine o estilo e as técnicas de escrita: 
imagens vívidas, descrições poderosas, sentenças 
equilibradas, paralelismo, e mais. Leia tales populares de Togo,
macedónio, de Romania, e de Rússia; aprenda sobre a estrutura 
e os testes padrões nos tales.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">caratterizza le lezioni circa le storia, i 
racconti pieghi, i poems e le lettere dalle esperienze nei volontari 
di Corpo di pace. Esamini lo stile e le tecniche di 
scrittura: immagini chiare, descrizioni potenti, frasi 
equilibrate, parallelismo e più. Legga i racconti pieghi dal 
Togo, macedone, dalla Romania e dalla Russia; impari circa la 
struttura ed i modelli nei racconti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαθήματα χαρακτηριστικών γνωρισμάτων για τις ιστορίες,
τις λαϊκές ιστορίες, τα ποιήματα, και τις επιστολές από την 
εμπειρία των εθελοντών ειρήνης Σώμα. Εξετάστε το ύφος
γραψίματος και τις τεχνικές: οι ζωηρές εικόνες, ισχυρές 
περιγραφές, ισορρόπησαν τις προτάσεις, τον παραλληλισμό, και 
περισσότερων. Διαβάστε τις λαϊκές ιστορίες από το Τόγκο, 
μακεδονικά, τη Ρουμανία, και τη Ρωσία  μάθετε για τη δομή 
και τα πρότυπα στις ιστορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece lecciones sobre historias, cuentos 
populares, poemas, y cartas de las experiencias de los voluntarios del
cuerpo de paz. Examine el estilo y las técnicas de escritura: 
imágenes vivas, descripciones de gran alcance, sentencias 
equilibradas, paralelismo, y más. Lea los cuentos populares de 
Togo, macedonio, de Rumania, y de Rusia; aprenda sobre la 
estructura y modelos en los cuentos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207139</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104501</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/arts-and-literature-peace-corps</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
